name: TODOIST - roughunderbelly style
description:
todoist is a simple yet effective todolist. it delivers a fast "FLOW" that makes it more productive (for me) than "old" players like tadalist and remember the milk. 
since i like my apps a bit more colorful i decided to "pimp" it out a bit. i was going for that cool roughunderbelly.com look.
came out kinda nifty :)

oron mizrachi (requests - mail_me [AT] nana.co.il)

to Aliji - in order to replace the logo you'll have to give the #logo>IMG visibility hidden and then give your own logo by attaching a background image to the logo container. that should do it. i did on my delicious vibes skin. you should check it out. enjoy the skin :)
